resources.string: Tap your mobile phone to the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT to check its use case capabilities!
Please select a use case beforehand and try again!
Please select the use case you would like to personalize the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT for!\n
The OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT is already personalized for a use case, please reset the device!\n
Enter a COTT server address and tap your mobile phone to the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT to personalize it for the brand protection use case!\n
OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT successfully personalized for the brand protection use case, returning to main application!\n
Please tap your phone to the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT to personalize it for the host parameterization via async. data transfer use case!\n
OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT successfully personalized for the host parameterization via async. data transfer use case, returning to main application!\n
Please enter the desired Bluetooth address and tap your mobile phone to the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT to personalize it for the static connection handover use case!\n
OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT successfully personalized for the static connection handover use case, returning to main application!\n
Please ensure that the Bluetooth MAC is 6 bytes long!\n
Please tap your mobile phone to the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT to reset it to its default state! This may take a few seconds…\n
OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT restored to default state, returning to main application!\n
Reset not successful, please keep the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT close to the NFC antenna of your mobile phone and retry!\n
Please tap your mobile phone to the OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT to personalize it for the host parameterization via pass-through use case!\n
OPTIGA™\u00A0Authenticate\u00A0NBT successfully personalized for the host parameterization via pass-through use case, returning to main application!\n
Please make sure to give the app essential location permissions
